name: Highway 2D
description:
Highway 2D is a trilling endless android game in which you have to control the Car.

You just have to tilt your phone to left to move your car to left and right to move right. And don't get hit by other vehicles.

This game is our first game made with accelerometer.

Keep track of your score and try to get highest score ever.

So what's your score? ☺
